imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

storageClass.description: Global storage class for dynamic provisioning

kubeVersion.description: Force target Kubernetes version (using Helm capabilities if not set)

commonAnnotations.description: Common annotations to add to all MariaDB resources (sub-charts are not considered)

commonLabels.description: Common labels to add to all MariaDB resources (sub-charts are not considered)

schedulerName.description: Name of the scheduler (other than default) to dispatch pods

runtimeClassName.description: Name of the Runtime Class for all MariaDB pods

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release (evaluated as a template)

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

tag.description: MariaDB image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: MariaDB image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

debug.description: Specify if debug logs should be enabled

rootPassword.description: Password for the `root` user. Ignored if existing secret is provided.

database.description: Name for a custom database to create

username.description: Name for a custom user to create

password.description: Password for the new user. Ignored if existing secret is provided

replicationPassword.description: MariaDB replication user password. Ignored if existing secret is provided

existingSecret.description: Use existing secret for password details (`auth.rootPassword`, `auth.password`, `auth.replicationPassword` will be ignored and picked up from this secret). The secret has to contain the keys `mariadb-root-password`, `mariadb-replication-password` and `mariadb-password`

forcePassword.description: Force users to specify required passwords

usePasswordFiles.description: Mount credentials as files instead of using environment variables

customPasswordFiles.description: Use custom password files when `auth.usePasswordFiles` is set to `true`. Define path for keys `root` and `user`, also define `replicator` if `architecture` is set to `replication`

initdbScriptsConfigMap.description: ConfigMap with the initdb scripts (Note: Overrides `initdbScripts`)

name.description: Name of the primary database (eg primary, master, leader, ...)

command.description: Override default container command on MariaDB Primary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args on MariaDB Primary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

lifecycleHooks.description: for the MariaDB Primary container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

configuration.description: MariaDB Primary configuration to be injected as ConfigMap
configuration.default:
[mysqld]
skip-name-resolve
explicit_defaults_for_timestamp
basedir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb
datadir=/bitnami/mariadb/data
plugin_dir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/plugin
port=3306
socket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock
tmpdir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp
max_allowed_packet=16M
bind-address=*
pid-file=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysqld.pid
log-error=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/logs/mysqld.log
character-set-server=UTF8
collation-server=utf8_general_ci
slow_query_log=0
long_query_time=10.0

[client]
port=3306
socket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock
default-character-set=UTF8
plugin_dir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/plugin

[manager]
port=3306
socket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock
pid-file=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysqld.pid

existingConfigmap.description: Name of existing ConfigMap with MariaDB Primary configuration.

rollingUpdatePartition.description: Partition update strategy for Mariadb Primary statefulset

podAnnotations.description: Additional pod annotations for MariaDB primary pods

podLabels.description: Extra labels for MariaDB primary pods

podAffinityPreset.description: MariaDB primary pod affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: MariaDB primary pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: MariaDB primary node affinity preset type. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: MariaDB primary node label key to match Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

values.description: MariaDB primary node label values to match. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

affinity.description: Affinity for MariaDB primary pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for MariaDB primary pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for MariaDB primary pods assignment

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

podManagementPolicy.description: podManagementPolicy to manage scaling operation of MariaDB primary pods

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for MariaDB primary pods assignment

priorityClassName.description: Priority class for MariaDB primary pods assignment

runtimeClassName.description: Runtime Class for MariaDB primary pods

enabled.description: Enable security context for MariaDB primary pods

fsGroup.description: Group ID for the mounted volumes' filesystem

runAsUser.description: User ID for the MariaDB primary container

runAsNonRoot.description: Set primary container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

privileged.description: Set primary container's Security Context privileged

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Set primary container's Security Context allowPrivilegeEscalation

limits.description: The resources limits for MariaDB primary containers

requests.description: The requested resources for MariaDB primary containers

customStartupProbe.description: Override default startup probe for MariaDB primary containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Override default liveness probe for MariaDB primary containers

customReadinessProbe.description: Override default readiness probe for MariaDB primary containers

startupWaitOptions.description: Override default builtin startup wait check options for MariaDB primary containers

extraFlags.description: MariaDB primary additional command line flags

extraEnvVars.description: Extra environment variables to be set on MariaDB primary containers

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for MariaDB primary containers

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for MariaDB primary containers

enabled.description: Enable persistence on MariaDB primary replicas using a `PersistentVolumeClaim`. If false, use emptyDir

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing `PersistentVolumeClaim` for MariaDB primary replicas

subPath.description: Subdirectory of the volume to mount at

storageClass.description: MariaDB primary persistent volume storage Class

annotations.description: MariaDB primary persistent volume claim annotations

accessModes.description: MariaDB primary persistent volume access Modes

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes to the MariaDB Primary pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the MariaDB Primary container(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers for the MariaDB Primary pod(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers for the MariaDB Primary pod(s)

mysql.description: MariaDB Primary Kubernetes service port for MariaDB

metrics.description: MariaDB Primary Kubernetes service port for metrics

mysql.description: MariaDB Primary Kubernetes service node port

clusterIP.description: MariaDB Primary Kubernetes service clusterIP IP

loadBalancerIP.description: MariaDB Primary loadBalancerIP if service type is `LoadBalancer`

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Address that are allowed when MariaDB Primary service is LoadBalancer

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

annotations.description: Provide any additional annotations which may be required

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation for MariaDB primary pods

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of MariaDB primary pods that must still be available after the eviction

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of MariaDB primary pods that can be unavailable after the eviction

revisionHistoryLimit.description: Maximum number of revisions that will be maintained in the StatefulSet

name.description: Name of the secondary database (eg secondary, slave, ...)

command.description: Override default container command on MariaDB Secondary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args on MariaDB Secondary container(s) (useful when using custom images)

lifecycleHooks.description: for the MariaDB Secondary container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

configuration.description: MariaDB Secondary configuration to be injected as ConfigMap
configuration.default:
[mysqld]
skip-name-resolve
explicit_defaults_for_timestamp
basedir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb
datadir=/bitnami/mariadb/data
port=3306
socket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock
tmpdir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp
max_allowed_packet=16M
bind-address=0.0.0.0
pid-file=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysqld.pid
log-error=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/logs/mysqld.log
character-set-server=UTF8
collation-server=utf8_general_ci
slow_query_log=0
long_query_time=10.0

[client]
port=3306
socket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock
default-character-set=UTF8

[manager]
port=3306
socket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock
pid-file=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysqld.pid

existingConfigmap.description: Name of existing ConfigMap with MariaDB Secondary configuration.

rollingUpdatePartition.description: Partition update strategy for Mariadb Secondary statefulset

podAnnotations.description: Additional pod annotations for MariaDB secondary pods

podLabels.description: Extra labels for MariaDB secondary pods

podAffinityPreset.description: MariaDB secondary pod affinity preset. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: MariaDB secondary pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: MariaDB secondary node affinity preset type. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: MariaDB secondary node label key to match Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set.

values.description: MariaDB secondary node label values to match. Ignored if `secondary.affinity` is set.

affinity.description: Affinity for MariaDB secondary pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for MariaDB secondary pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for MariaDB secondary pods assignment

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for MariaDB secondary pods assignment

priorityClassName.description: Priority class for MariaDB secondary pods assignment

runtimeClassName.description: Runtime Class for MariaDB secondary pods

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

podManagementPolicy.description: podManagementPolicy to manage scaling operation of MariaDB secondary pods

enabled.description: Enable security context for MariaDB secondary pods

fsGroup.description: Group ID for the mounted volumes' filesystem

runAsUser.description: User ID for the MariaDB secondary container

runAsNonRoot.description: Set secondary container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

privileged.description: Set secondary container's Security Context privileged

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Set secondary container's Security Context allowPrivilegeEscalation

limits.description: The resources limits for MariaDB secondary containers

requests.description: The requested resources for MariaDB secondary containers

customStartupProbe.description: Override default startup probe for MariaDB secondary containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Override default liveness probe for MariaDB secondary containers

customReadinessProbe.description: Override default readiness probe for MariaDB secondary containers

startupWaitOptions.description: Override default builtin startup wait check options for MariaDB secondary containers

extraFlags.description: MariaDB secondary additional command line flags

extraEnvVars.description: Extra environment variables to be set on MariaDB secondary containers

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for MariaDB secondary containers

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for MariaDB secondary containers

enabled.description: Enable persistence on MariaDB secondary replicas using a `PersistentVolumeClaim`

subPath.description: Subdirectory of the volume to mount at

storageClass.description: MariaDB secondary persistent volume storage Class

annotations.description: MariaDB secondary persistent volume claim annotations

accessModes.description: MariaDB secondary persistent volume access Modes

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes to the MariaDB secondary pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the MariaDB secondary container(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers for the MariaDB secondary pod(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers for the MariaDB secondary pod(s)

mysql.description: MariaDB secondary Kubernetes service port for MariaDB

metrics.description: MariaDB secondary Kubernetes service port for metrics

mysql.description: MariaDB secondary Kubernetes service node port

clusterIP.description: MariaDB secondary Kubernetes service clusterIP IP

loadBalancerIP.description: MariaDB secondary loadBalancerIP if service type is `LoadBalancer`

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Address that are allowed when MariaDB secondary service is LoadBalancer

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

annotations.description: Provide any additional annotations which may be required

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation for MariaDB secondary pods

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of MariaDB secondary pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of MariaDB secondary pods that may be made unavailable

revisionHistoryLimit.description: Maximum number of revisions that will be maintained in the StatefulSet

create.description: Enable the creation of a ServiceAccount for MariaDB pods

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Automount service account token for the server service account

create.description: Whether to create and use RBAC resources or not

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes the owner and group of the persistent volume(s) mountpoint to `runAsUser:fsGroup`

tag.description: Init container volume-permissions image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Init container volume-permissions image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullPolicy.description: Init container volume-permissions image pull policy

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

tag.description: Exporter image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Exporter image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

enabled.description: Enable security context for MariaDB metrics container

privileged.description: Set metrics container's Security Context privileged

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Set metrics container's Security Context allowPrivilegeEscalation

limits.description: The resources limits for MariaDB prometheus exporter containers

requests.description: The requested resources for MariaDB prometheus exporter containers

enabled.description: Create ServiceMonitor Resource for scraping metrics using PrometheusOperator

namespace.description: Namespace which Prometheus is running in

jobLabel.description: The name of the label on the target service to use as the job name in prometheus.

interval.description: Interval at which metrics should be scraped

scrapeTimeout.description: Specify the timeout after which the scrape is ended

relabelings.description: RelabelConfigs to apply to samples before scraping

metricRelabelings.description: MetricRelabelConfigs to apply to samples before ingestion

honorLabels.description: honorLabels chooses the metric's labels on collisions with target labels

enabled.description: if `true`, creates a Prometheus Operator PrometheusRule (also requires `metrics.enabled` to be `true` and `metrics.prometheusRule.rules`)

namespace.description: Namespace for the PrometheusRule Resource (defaults to the Release Namespace)

additionalLabels.description: Additional labels that can be used so PrometheusRule will be discovered by Prometheus

enabled.description: Enable ingress rule that makes primary mariadb nodes only accessible from a particular origin.

customRules.description: Custom network policy for the primary node.

enabled.description: Enable ingress rule that makes primary mariadb nodes only accessible from a particular origin.

customRules.description: Custom network policy for the secondary nodes.

denyConnectionsToExternal.description: Enable egress rule that denies outgoing traffic outside the cluster, except for DNS (port 53).
